ModMetaData.name: CaveBiome (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Rikiki
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Rikikis mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=837412700
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wtwHAQu.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/CaveBiome
--- Original Description --- This mod adds a new biome: cave. This will allow you to explore and settle into the deep tunnels of this Rimworld. WARNING! Caveworld Flora must be enabled BEFORE this mod! See the forum thread for content/changelog and related mods. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=13172.msg133449#msg133449
